title: B2B Campaign Member Components

xdm:sourceCampaignMemberID.title: Source Campaign Member ID
xdm:sourceCampaignMemberID.description: Campaign member unique identifier at source.

xdm:sourceCampaignID.title: Source Campaign ID
xdm:sourceCampaignID.description: Campaign unique identifier at the source.

xdm:sourceExternalID.title: Source External ID
xdm:sourceExternalID.description: External unique identifier at the source.

xdm:sourcePersonID.title: Source Person ID
xdm:sourcePersonID.description: Campaign owner unique identifier at the source.
